name: CuDe Adventure
description:
CuDe

CuDe, is a dark and colorful game at where we play Cude.

Cude embodies innocence, he cannot attack his enemy with blows
but he can make his enemy forget his anger by seeking the right strategy.

You are Cude, you have to explore a terrifying imaginary world, but above all filled with good things not unlike life.
